verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is the Lord!
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is our God!
He who always liveth, Evermore the same
Heavâ€™n and earth He ruleth, Come and praise His name!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is the Lord!
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is our God!
Glorious adn beloved Is the One adored!
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is the Lord.
